thread.section_title: Dharma Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: weekend on Rome
thread.title_full: weekend on Rome - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Michael T
title: weekend on Rome
text:
we chose this hotel due to its central location, a short walk from termini, and the positive reviews on TripAdvisor. we were certainly not disappointed.
the metro station is a short walk away and the Colosseum tourist area a 15 minuet walk. the room was clean and bright, the design a bit " quirky" with a large wall / door opening out to reveal the shower room.
the staff were very helpful and polite.
we would chose to stay here again.
